definition[0]: if a meeting, parliament, law court etc adjourns, or if the person in charge adjourns it, it stops for a short time
example[0]: It was almost noon when the meeting adjourned.
example[1]: Congress has adjourned for the November elections.
example[2]: His trial was adjourned until May.
definition[1]: if a meeting or law court adjourns, or if the person in charge adjourns it, it finishes or stops, either for a short time, or until the next time it meets
example[3]: The chairman has the power to adjourn the meeting at any time.
